name: MessageReceiver
description: Plugin to receive messages from an external V2X radio or other source

configuration.description: The log level for this plugin

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provides, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.
Comma separated list of SAE J2735 message ID values.
IP address for the incoming message network connection.
Port for the incoming message network connection.
Set the flag to route/broadcast a received J2735 message to TMX Core.
Accept and route incoming BSM messages from a V2X Hub simulator.
Accept and route incoming SRM messages from a V2X Hub simulator.
Accept and route incoming GPS location messages from a V2X Hub simulator.
If enabled, security HSM features are enabled and MessageReceiver Plugin will try to verify incoming message.
REST API endpoint url needed to make HSM calls
